illandril-token-tooltips.setting.visibil: Tooltip Visibility adjusts which tokens show tooltips for players. Tooltips are shown for all tokens for GMs.
Neutral and Friendly Tokens (PC and NPC)
illandril-token-tooltips.setting.itemsMi: Sets the minimum permission a player must have to see items in an actor's tooltip. Note: GMs are considered Owners for all actors. Item visibility is also controlled for each individual item in the actor's sheet (currently only available for the default 5e character sheet).
illandril-token-tooltips.setting.hidePla: Hides Item details from GMs in tooltips for actors with a player owner.
illandril-token-tooltips.setting.spellsM: Sets the minimum permission a player must have to see Spell Slots in an actor's tooltip. Note: GMs are considered Owners for all actors.
illandril-token-tooltips.setting.hidePla: Hide Player Spell Slots from GM
Hides Spell Slot details from GMs in tooltips for actors with a player owner.
illandril-token-tooltips.setting.resourc: Sets the minimum permission a player must have to see Resources in an actor's tooltip. Note: GMs are considered Owners for all actors.
illandril-token-tooltips.setting.hidePla: Hides Resource details from GMs in tooltips for actors with a player owner.
illandril-token-tooltips.setting.movemen: Sets the minimum permission a player must have to see Movement in an actor's tooltip. Note: GMs are considered Owners for all actors.
